issue.title: custom main problems with time and loading plugins

content.raw:
I can confirm that the real time is not updating properly, and the iterations field does not display a cumulative total, but rather a count down for each instance of `gazebo::runWorld`.

I'm still trying to confirm that plugins aren't loading. Be sure to note that the gazebo console streams (`gzerr`, `gzwarn`, `gzdbg`) will not go to the console unless the following line is added to the custom main program:
~~~
gazebo::common::Console::SetQuiet(false);
~~~
content.html:
I can confirm that the real time is not updating properly, and the iterations field does not display a cumulative total, but rather a count down for each instance of gazebo::runWorld.

I'm still trying to confirm that plugins aren't loading. Be sure to note that the gazebo console streams (gzerr, gzwarn, gzdbg) will not go to the console unless the following line is added to the custom main program:

gazebo::common::Console::SetQuiet(false);
